main:
{
  "name": "hexo-site",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "build": "hexo generate",
    "clean": "hexo clean",
    "deploy-build": "pushd themes/Fuwafuwataimu && npm run build && popd && hexo g && node deploy/deploy.js && hexo deploy",
    "deploy-cos": "node deploy/deploy.js",
    "deploy": "hexo g  && hexo deploy",
    "server": "hexo server",
    "server-draft": "HEXO_IS_SHOW_DRAFT=1 hexo server --draft"
  },
  "hexo": {
    "version": "5.3.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "cos-nodejs-sdk-v5": "^2.8.4",
    "glob": "^7.1.6",
    "hexo": "^5.3.0",
    "hexo-deployer-git": "^2.1.0",
    "hexo-generator-archive": "^1.0.0",
    "hexo-generator-category": "^1.0.0",
    "hexo-generator-index": "^2.0.0",
    "hexo-generator-sitemap": "^2.1.0",
    "hexo-generator-tag": "^1.0.0",
    "hexo-renderer-ejs": "^1.0.0",
    "hexo-renderer-marked": "^3.3.0",
    "hexo-renderer-stylus": "^2.0.1",
    "hexo-server": "^2.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "hexo-browsersync": "^0.3.0"
  }
}
